doc:
Gerry Johnson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerry_Johnson 0 Gerry Johnson (April 4, 1918 – January 24, 1990) was an American actress, best known as the second voice actress of Betty Rubble during seasons five and six of the animated television series The Flintstones. Gerry_Johnson ( April_4_,_1918 – January_24 , 1990 ) was an_American_actress , best_known as the_second_voice_actress of Betty_Rubble during seasons five_and_six of the_animated_television_series The_Flintstones .
